title: First Release of Fontlab .vfb QuickLook Plugin
content:
I’m proud to anounce the first release of a vfb QuickLook Plugin for MacOSX Leopard. This is the long-missing thumbnail and preview generator for FontLab Studio document files. Now the .vfb files are real citizens in MacOSX.

please have a look at: [schriftgestaltung.de/tools/vfb-QuickLook.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085426/http:/schriftgestaltung.de/tools/vfb-QuickLook.html)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020085426im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vfb-quicklook-screenshot_5216.png)
author: schriftgestalt
